ygData.subject: Hunting minotaurs for horns
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just an aside, but if you are hanging for a minotaur horn, don t bust a gut to hunt minotaurs to get one.  I bought mine from a store in Freeport for
ygData.messageBody:
jay schultze wrote:

> Depends on where you currently are hanging out. I was mostly in Beholder
> around that level with a group. Hunting minos for their axes and a horn (for
> later use).

Just an aside, but if you are hanging for a minotaur horn, don't
bust a gut to hunt minotaurs to get one. I bought mine from a
store in Freeport for around the 5g mark. Much easier, and less
fun, too. But if you have other things to do, I'd recommend my
method.


Rocket
